snippet: Mark Edward, in coming clean about tricks used for duping people, tries to enter a class of magicians and mediums who perform their crafts and also debunk them.
abstract: Mark Oppenheimer Beliefs column observes that Mark Edward, a professional medium, has written the book Psychic Blues: Confessions of a Conflicted Medium, and has thus entered the ranks of people who both perform their craft and debunk it at the same time.
lead_paragraph: Mark Edward, in coming clean about tricks used for duping people, tries to enter a class of magicians and mediums who perform their crafts and also debunk them.

headline.print_headline: Pro Medium Repents for Life of Cons
headline.seo: In Book, Mark Edward Tells Tricks Used as a Medium
headline.main: Pro Medium Repents for Life of Cons
